amendment.description: Amendment requires each agency to describe steps taken to determine a new rule or regulation that is not duplicative or conflicting with any existing or planned regulatory action and to require agencies to maintain a list of active regulatory actions on websites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (IA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 265 - 158 (Roll no. 117).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Young (IA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (IA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 265 - 158 (Roll no. 117).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
